texts.value: May act as a specification marker at earliest stage specification of lymphocytes between B- and T-cell development. Marks the earliest stage of B-cell specification
Expressed exclusively at the outer cell surface of transitional epithelia and the keratinocyte of stratified squamous epithelia

properties.value: Post-translational modification: synthesis of GPI-anchored proteins
